subject: studies show that largely depends on the pill  Valarie
body:
The best way will be to avoid each other without appearing to do so -- or if we jostle, at any rate not to bite.

It would be difficult to exaggerate the degree to which we are influenced by those we influence.

I'd hate to be a teetotaler. Imagine getting up in the morning and knowing that's as good as you're going to feel all day.

Fashions are born and they die too quickly for anyone to learn to love them.

All glory comes from daring to begin.

I am lord of myself, accountable to none.

The God who gave us life, gave us liberty at the same time.

An evil life is a kind of death.

What's wrong with being a boring kind of guy?

I would never have amounted to anything were it not for adversity. I was forced to come up the hard way.

It is a fine thing to be honest, but it is also very important to be right.

The amplest knowledge has the largest faith. Ignorance is always incredulous.

Man is least himself when he talks in his own person. Give him a mask, and he will tell you the truth.
